subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Catcher Ronny Paulino has been traded for the second time in 24 hours and the third time since December, and he is now with the Florida Marlins. The Giants sent Paulino to Florida for the minor league pitcher Hector Correa. The deal was announced Saturday after Paulino was traded Friday to the Giants from the Phillies for pitcher Jack Taschner. Paulino was traded to the Phillies from Pittsburgh on Dec. 10 for catcher Jason Jaramillo. Paulino hit .212 last season.
